entry.string: The webdavserver module exposes the webdav protocol for a Xaraya site. A traditional webdav implementation does this by pointing at a certain location on the webserver and serving up files from there over WebDAV.
entry.translation: Zee vebdefserfer mudoole-a ixpuses zee vebdef prutucul fur a Xereya seete-a. A tredeeshunel vebdef implementeshun dues thees by pueenting et a certeeen luceshun oon zee vebserfer und serfeeng up feeles frum zeere-a oofer VebDEF.

entry.string: The Xaraya WebDAV implementation exposes a virtual filesystem based on the content of the site and (optionally) a location on the server. The modules, their itemtypes and the items therein are elements in this virtual filesystem which can then be accessed over WebDAV.
entry.translation: Zee Xereya VebDEF implementeshun ixpuses a furtooel feelesystem besed oon zee cuntent ooff zee seete-a und (oopshunelly) a luceshun oon zee serfer. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp! Zee mudooles, zeeur itemtypes und zee items zeereeen ere-a ilements in thees furtooel feelesystem vheech cun zeen be-a eccessed oofer VebDEF.

entry.string: WebDAV runs as a webservice in Xaraya, like xmlrpc and soap, so it's entry point is ws.php instead of index.php.
entry.translation: VebDEF roons es a vebserfeece-a in Xereya, leeke-a xmlrpc und suep, su it's intry pueent is ws.php insteed ooff index.php.

entry.string: After the usual install through the modules module the WebDAV server is operational and doesn't need any configuration in Xaraya itself. However because we need a virtual filesystem root, we need a mapping from the entrypoint (ws.php?type=webdav&path=/) to a directory like name where the virtual filesystem starts. To create such a mapping it is necessary at this time to create a ReWrite rule in your webserver.
entry.translation: Effter zee usooel instell thruoogh zee mudooles mudoole-a zee VebDEF serfer is oopereshunel und duesn't need uny cunffeegooreshun in Xereya itselff. Hooefer becoose-a ve-a need a furtooel feelesystem ruut, ve-a need a meppeeng frum zee intrypueent (ws.php?type=webdav&path=/) tu a durectury leeke-a neme-a vhere-a zee furtooel feelesystem sterts. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Tu creete-a sooch a meppeeng it is necessery et thees teeme-a tu creete-a a ReVreete-a roole-a in yuoor vebserfer. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: The easiest way (i think) to create such a rewrite rule is to place a .htaccess file in the webroot where xaraya is installed with similar contents as shown below:
entry.translation: Zee ieseeest vey (i theenk) tu creete-a sooch a rooreete-a roole-a is tu plece-a a .hteccess feele-a in zee vebruut vhere-a xereya is instelled veet seemiler cuntents es shoon beloo:

entry.string: The specific contents of this file may differ in your situation, but there are a number of elements in it which should be present. The actual rewrite rule is at line 5.
entry.translation: Zee speceeffic cuntents ooff thees feele-a mey deeffffer in yuoor seetooeshun, boot zeere-a ere-a a noomber ooff ilements in it vheech shuoold be-a present. Um de hur de hur de hur. Zee ectooel rooreete-a roole-a is et leene-a 5.

entry.string: Line 1 turns the ReWriteEngine on for Apache, this may not be necessary if you have this already enabled.
entry.translation: Leene-a 1 toorns zee ReVreeteEngine-a oon fur Epeche-a, thees mey nut be-a necessery iff yuoo hefe-a thees elreedy inebled. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: I needed line 2 because some things in my webroot are symbolic links to somewhere else, Line 2 makes sure they are followed through
entry.translation: I needed leene-a 2 becoose-a sume-a theengs in my vebruut ere-a symbuleec leenks tu sumoohere-a ilse-a, Leene-a 2 mekes soore-a zeey ere-a fullooed thruoogh

entry.string: The rewriterule on line 4 says i forbid access to the .htaccess file itself
entry.translation: Zee rooreeteroole-a oon leene-a 4 seys i furbeed eccess tu zee .hteccess feele-a itselff

entry.string: The key line in the .htaccess file is line 5. You'll notice the word 'webdav' in there and the entrypoint for the webdavserver. What this line does is if a request comes in at host.com/content/ over webdav Xaraya actually executes host.com/ws.php?type=webdav&path=/content/
entry.translation: Zee key leene-a in zee .hteccess feele-a is leene-a 5. Yuoo'll nuteece-a zee vurd 'vebdef' in zeere-a und zee intrypueent fur zee vebdefserfer. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp! Vhet thees leene-a dues is iff a reqooest cumes in et host.com/content/ oofer vebdef Xereya ectooelly ixecootes host.com/ws.php?type=webdav&path=/content/

entry.string: After this the /content/ is the root of the virtual filesystem Xaraya will create and:
entry.translation: Effter thees zee /content/ is zee ruut ooff zee furtooel feelesystem Xereya veell creete-a und:

entry.string: will be the location to point your WebDAV to.
entry.translation: veell be-a zee luceshun tu pueent yuoor VebDEF tu.

entry.string: Requires PHP version 4.3 later than August 2003
entry.translation: Reqooures PHP ferseeun 4.3 leter thun Oogoost 2003
